## Describe your changes

## Type of change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Infrastructure as Code (Terraform/AWS updates)

## Checklist before requesting a review

- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have verified that `terraform plan` looks correct in the GitHub comments
- [ ] I have updated the documentation (README.md) if necessary
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings in `tflint` or `trivy`
